entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -0.7°C

Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
